title: Mercury Transit in the 8th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 8th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, thinking becomes deep, investigative, and focused on hidden matters. Topics related to shared finances, taxes, inheritance, psychology, and transformation come into sharp mental focus. Conversations may involve sensitive or confidential issues. This phase favors research, audits, and uncovering truths, but excessive suspicion or mental obsession can create stress. When handled consciously, this transit supports strategic insight, emotional intelligence, and intelligent handling of joint resources.
closing: This Mercury transit deepens perception and insight. With clarity, it supports research, truth-seeking, and smart handling of sensitive matters.
